content: This is documentation for Creatio 8.2 . For up-to-date documentation, see the latest version ( 8.3 ). Version: 8.2 Freedom UI component Validator Converter Request handler Localization Asserts Classic UI component Requirements for icons
markdown:
This is documentation for Creatio **8.2**.

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/dev/development-on-creatio-platform/category/custom-components)** (8.3).
